title: Native Forward CPA Examination Funding 2025-2026
short_description: Financial assistance for CPA examination sections
full_description: Native Forward Scholars Fund, in partnership with the Johnson Scholarship Foundation, provides financial assistance to American Indians and Alaska Natives to assist with the costs associated with taking the CPA examination sections. Eligible applicants may receive assistance no more than one time for each section of the CPA examination.
eligibility: Must be a member of a federally recognized Tribe and meet all CPA examination requirements.
